articles.description: Latest football news and gossip, build-up to Tuesday's Premier League matches, plus news conferences.
articles.title: Football latest and build-up to Tuesday's Premier League matches

articles.description: England all-rounder Ben Stokes asks to not be considered for selection for this summer's T20 World Cup to focus on his fitness.
articles.title: Stokes opts out of T20 World Cup

articles.description: Brazilian teams have won the past five editions of the Copa Libertadores. Tim Vickery looks at which sides could stop them this year.
articles.title: Who can end Brazil's Copa Libertadores dominance?

articles.description: Devin Booker scores 52 points as the Phoenix Suns beat the New Orleans Pelicans 124-111 to boost their chances of qualifying for the play-offs.
articles.title: NBA: Devin Booker scores 52 points as Phoenix Suns beat New Orleans Pelicans

articles.description: FC Saarbrucken boss Rudiger Ziehl says it would be "crazy to forbid dreaming" with his third-tier underdogs one win from the German Cup final.
articles.title: Third-tier German giant-slayers on brink of final

articles.description: England prop Vickii Cornborough retires from international rugby, saying she is "not ready" to balance motherhood and playing for her country.
articles.title: England's Cornborough retires from internationals

articles.description: BBC Sport's F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions before this weekend's Japanese Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Andrew Benson answers your questions before Japanese Grand Prix

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on UB40 drummer & Birmingham City fan Jimmy Brown to predict the outcome of the midweek Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v UB40 drummer Jimmy Brown

articles.description: Unified super-middleweight boxing champion Savannah Marshall will make her MMA debut in Newcastle on 8 June.
articles.title: Savannah Marshall: Boxing champion to make MMA debut in Newcastle

articles.description: New Manchester City Netflix documentary series Together: Treble Winners brings out a lighter side of the team.
articles.title: New Man City documentary shows lighter side of players
